consoleData.description: If set to 0, the radar is maximally used. Otherwise the player is always centered, even at map extents.

uiData.label: cl_radar_always_centered
uiData.helperText: If set to 0, the radar is maximally used. Otherwise the player is always centered, even at map extents.

consoleData.description: Sets the minimum icon scale. Valid values are 0.4 to 1.25.

uiData.label: cl_radar_icon_scale_min
uiData.helperText: Sets the minimum icon scale. Valid values are 0.4 to 1.25.

consoleData.description: Sets the radar scale. Valid values are 0.25 to 1.0.

uiData.label: cl_radar_scale
uiData.helperText: Sets the radar scale. Valid values are 0.25 to 1.0.

consoleData.description: If set, the radar will toggle to square when the scoreboard is visible.

uiData.label: cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard
uiData.helperText: If set, the radar will toggle to square when the scoreboard is visible.
